title: Mahindra & Skoda VW poised for 50:50 EV joint venture: Focus on battery-powered SUVs
description: Mahindra & Mahindra and Skoda Auto Volkswagen India are finalizing a 50:50 joint venture to share costs, technology, and vehicle platforms, focusing on electric SUVs for both Indian and international markets. The partnership will use facilities in Chakan, Pune, for production. An announcement is expected by year-end. The JV is a significant step for both companies amidst increasing government push for electric vehicles and stricter carbon emission regulations.
